text.tspan: Escaping the Malthusian trap: Population and real wages in
Unit 2 'Technology, population, and growth’ Section 2.10 'Escaping from Malthusian stagnation' in The CORE Team, The
Note: The data points at each year are calculated averages over the succeeding decade. CC-BY-ND-NC
